meanings.definition: resembling or characteristic of a dweeb
meanings.sent1: She wore dweebish glasses that made her look nerdy.
meanings.sent2: His dweebish outfit consisted of high-waisted pants and suspenders.
meanings.sent3: The dweebish hat he wore made him stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her dweebish behavior at the science fair was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The dweebish character in the movie was always the smartest one.

meanings.sent1: He spoke in a dweebish tone when discussing his favorite video game.
meanings.sent2: She acted dweebish by eagerly raising her hand in class.
meanings.sent3: His dweebish dance moves at the party were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The way he nervously fidgeted was dweebish in nature.
meanings.sent5: The dweebish way he avoided eye contact showed his shyness.

meanings.sent1: The room was decorated in a dweebish style with comic book posters.
meanings.sent2: Her dweebish personality shone through when she talked about coding.
meanings.sent3: The dweebish smell of old books filled the library.
meanings.sent4: His dweebish interests in science fiction novels were evident.
meanings.sent5: The dweebish charm of his awkward smile was endearing.
